hero.headline: Modern Mexican Cuisine in the Heart of Austin
hero.subheadline: Farm-to-Table Ingredients • Award-Winning Chef • Craft Cocktails

about.title: Where Tradition Meets Innovation
about.text: Casa Moderna reimagines classic Mexican dishes with a contemporary twist. Chef Maria Elena brings 20 years of culinary experience, sourcing ingredients from local Texas farms and artisan producers. Our intimate 60-seat restaurant offers an unforgettable dining experience, whether you're celebrating a special occasion or enjoying a casual evening out.

services.name: Dinner Service
services.description: Tues-Sun 5PM-10PM. Experience our full menu featuring seasonal tasting options and signature dishes.

services.name: Weekend Brunch
services.description: Sat-Sun 10AM-2PM. Chilaquiles, huevos rancheros, and bottomless mimosas in a relaxed atmosphere.

services.name: Private Events
services.description: Host your next celebration in our private dining room. Custom menus for groups of 10-30 guests.

services.name: Catering
services.description: Bring Casa Moderna to your event. Full-service catering for weddings, corporate events, and parties.

testimonials.name: The Austin Chronicle
testimonials.content: Best New Restaurant 2025. Chef Maria Elena delivers bold flavors that honor Mexican heritage while pushing boundaries.

testimonials.name: Michael & Sarah T.
testimonials.content: We celebrated our anniversary here and it was perfect. The mole is life-changing and the margaritas are the best in Austin.

testimonials.name: Jennifer K.
testimonials.content: The brunch here is worth the wait. Don't miss the churro French toast and make a reservation!
